api.description: Control API, Event API and State API

build.artifact_cache.description: cache artifacts that were built before locally

build.cluster_custom.description: build in-cluster using a custom build script

build.cmd.build_image.description: Choose which artifacts to build. Artifacts with image names that contain the expression will be built only. Default is to build sources for all artifacts

build.cmd.output.description: Used in conjunction with --quiet flag. Format output with go-template. For full struct documentation, see https://godoc.org/github.com/GoogleContainerTools/skaffold/cmd/skaffold/app/flags#BuildOutput

build.gcb_docker.description: build Dockerfiles on Google Cloud Build

build.gcb_jib.description: build jib projects on Google Cloud Build

build.local_custom.description: build locally using a custom build script

build.local_docker.description: build Dockerfiles using the local Docker daemon and/or minikube/d4d daemon

build.prune.description: automated image pruning helps keep the disk footprint low

build.description: Build images based on multiple build tools in a configurable way

completion.description: generate completion scripts for bash, zsh

debug.description: Language-aware reconfiguration of containers on the fly to become debuggable

default_repo.description: specify a default image repository & rewrite image names to default repo

delete.description: delete everything deployed by skaffold run from the cluster

deploy.description: Deploy a set of deployables as your applications and replace the image name with the built images

deploy.cmd.description: separate command to run only deployment

deploy.helm.description: use helm charts as your deployable

deploy.kubecontext.description: specify kubecontext based on a flag, or skaffold.yaml

deploy.kubectl.description: use k8s manifests as your deployable

deploy.kustomize.description: use kustomize files as your deployable

deploy.status_check.description: User can wait for deployments to stabilize

fix.cmd.description: Upgrade an older skaffold config to the current version

generate_pipeline.tekton.description: User can generate a starter tekton pipeline using skaffold

global_config.description: store user preferences in a separate preferences file

init.description: Initialize a skaffold.yaml file based on the contents of the current directory

init.interactive.description: skaffold init interactive for CLI users

init.json_api.description: skaffold init JSON based API for IDE integrations

init.k8s_manifests.description: skaffold init recognizes k8s manifest and the image names in them

insecure_registry.description: Target registries for built images which are not secure

logging.description: automated log tailing of deployed pods

portforward.pods_automated.description: Port-forward pods with containers built by skaffold automatically for debug

portforward.services_automated.description: Port-forward services deployed by Skaffold automatically

portforward.user_defined.description: Port-forward any resources defined by the user in the skaffold.yaml for portforwarding

profiles.description: Create different pipeline configurations based on overrides and patches defined in one or more profiles

render.description: Skaffold render can produce the transformed manifests as a separate step

run.cmd.description: One-off build & deployment of the skaffold application

sync.infer.description: mark files as "syncable" - infer the destinations based on the Dockerfile

sync.manual.description: mark files as "syncable" that won't trigger a rebuild on change

sync.description: Instead of rebuilding, copy the changed files in the running container

tagpolicy.datetime.description: tag based on date and timestamp, configurable with datetime format

tagpolicy.digest.description: reintroduce DIGEST and content based digest tag

tagpolicy.envtagger.description: tag based on a template that uses environment variables and the IMAGE_NAME variable

tagpolicy.gitcommit.description: tag built images based on the gitCommit

tagpolicy.latest.description: tag with latest, use image digest / image ID for deployment

templating.description: certain fields of skaffold.yaml can be parametrized with environment and built-in variables

test.structure_test.description: run structure tests against built images

test.description: Run tests as part of your pipeline

triggers.manual.description: Manual trigger, checks for file changes only on stdin "return"

triggers.notify.description: The notify trigger checks for filechanges using native, filesytem level notifications

triggers.polling.description: Polling trigger, checks for file changes periodically

triggers.description: Feature area: Trigger configured actions when source files change

version.description: get the version string of the current skaffold binary
